name: quick-brick-app
description: This project is generated from @applicaster/zapplicaster-cli. It contains a quick brick app

scripts.build:ios: mkdir -p ios && node_modules/.bin/react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./ios/main.jsbundle --reset-cache
scripts.build:android: mkdir -p android && node_modules/.bin/react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./android/main.jsbundle --reset-cache

author: Applicaster
